Cedar_Rapids.James W. and Ida G. Bowman House: The James W. and Ida G. Bowman House is a historic building located in Marion, Iowa, United States. The Bowman's hired the Cedar Rapids architectural firm of Dieman & Fiske, and specifically partner Charles Dieman, to design this two-story wood frame house that combines American Craftsman and Prairie School influences. Local contractor Charles I. Wilson completed construction in 1910 in a neighborhood populated by prominent citizens.
